channel.title: Uru: Myst Online anyone?
channel.description:
If Half Life is considered the thinking man's FPS, have any of you tried Uru, the thinking man's adventure?
[url='https://mystonline.com/en/']https://mystonline.com/en/[/url]
It may be dated, but it's really deep for those of you that want an MMO that thinks on a different level.
And best of all it's free. Check it out sometime.

item.title: Uru: Myst Online anyone?
item.dc:creator: Vormaen
item.description:
I am an old timer there, during the time of the PROLOGUE back in 04. When the Cyan actors would interact with us explorers. Still praying for new funding. Am I the only one that thinks technology is at a point where Cyan can actually make new Myst games look like the static images of old, but in true 3d?

Read full topic

item.title: Uru: Myst Online anyone?
item.dc:creator: DinoThrasher
item.description:
Been playing pretty much since it was re-released. It gets dull once you complete all the puzzles it currently has, but it’s still fun and free.

Read full topic
